leaflet.candidateName: Chris Ford, David Schmitz, Cllr Karen Alexander

messages.title: Who will deliver FOR YOU in Harringay?
WORKING ALL YEAR ROUND - NOT JUST AT ELECTION TIMES

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Battling for 20mph limit on Wightman Road
Campaigning to save the Whittington A&E
Fighting for action on fly-tipping on the Ladder
Fighting for a safer Harringay Passage
Demanding fair funding for local schools
Fighting for campaign on local traffic chaos
Stopping illegal conversions of family homes

images.caption: STANDING UP FOR HARRINGAY WARD: Chris Ford, David Schmitz and Cllr Karen Alexander (left to right)

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet contains visual elements like a 'Liberal Democrats Winning Here' sign and photographs of the candidates to emphasize ongoing commitment and previous successes.
